name: Power Poker
description:
Power Poker

You start with 1000 credits and each round costs 10.  
(If you go to zero, don't worry, we'll give you more!) 

You are dealt five cards.  Hold the ones you like.  Discard the ones you don't and get new cards.  You win credits based on your final hand.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Power Poker is built using the LÖVE2d framework.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji –  the open-source emoji and icon project.  License: CC BY-SA 4.0
Some graphic elements from rawpixel.com
Deck of cards generated by me.uk/cards.
